name: liquid-glass
description: A Figma plugin for creating liquid glass effects

scripts.build:clear: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true});"
scripts.build:dirs: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.mkdirSync('dist', {recursive: true}); fs.mkdirSync('dist/ui', {recursive: true});"
scripts.build: npm run build:clear && npm run build:dirs && npm run build:code && npm run build:ui:simple && npm run build:copy
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.test:build: npm run build && echo Build test completed successfully

author: Prabin Pebam
